name: fetch-stuctures-xml
author: AM
description: Removes certain XML tags from a valid xml file

scripts.build: npm run build:fetch && npm run build:transform
scripts.build:fetch: ( cd fetch_structures && npm run build && npx si seq pack dist -o ../dist/fetch.tar.gz)
scripts.build:transform: (cd transform_xml && npm run build && npx si seq pack dist -o ../dist/transform.tar.gz)
